opener.dateline: 431 Stevens St. / Cor. West. / Camden / N. Jersey. Feb. 9, 1875.
opener.salute: My dear friends, John R. & Rebecca B. Johnston,

body.p: This then is the 28th anniversary of your marriage day.

postscript.p: I wonder if you either of you have any idea how the otherwise monotony of my Camden existence has been pleasantly rippled—how warm & bright those gleams to me—from the unvarying hospitality and sweet friendship of both of you—God bless you.
